AltName.entry: PEAK DISTRICT NATIONAL PARK LEARNING AND ENVIRONMENTAL CONFERENCE CENTRE

Desc.entry: Provides learning opportunities about the Peak District Park. Provides training courses for environmental professionals. Offers an environmentally friendly venue for conferences and seminars.

DisabledAccess.entry: Fully accessible accommodation and training rooms

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 8am-5.30pm, Sat & Sun 9am-5pm (except Christmas and New Year)
